price: Kuma abin da ta kasance tanã bautãwa, baicin Allah, ya kange ta. Lalle ita, tã kasance daga mutãne kãfirai.
arabic: وَصَدَّهَا مَا كَانَت تَّعۡبُدُ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِۖ إِنَّهَا كَانَتۡ مِن قَوۡمٖ كَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waṣaddahā mā kānat taʿbudu min dūni al-lahi innahā kānat min qawmin kāfirīna
